themes: concern over funding allocation favoring large, revenue-generating events
potential overshadowing of nonprofit arts organizations and artists
importance of non-economic value of the arts
dependence of nonprofits and artists on philanthropy
tension between economic impact and intrinsic cultural value
key_phrases: will completely over shadow (and take the majority of funding)
nonprofit arts organizations/artists that are dependent upon philanthropy
feeding the soul, not the coffer
that which can't be measured in dollars that brings the most value
barriers_identified: funding bias towards large, revenue-generating events
nonprofits and artists' reliance on philanthropy
difficulty measuring intrinsic value of the arts
